queryMap.query: SELECT /* e01010180_s01 */ ALARM_GBN --알림구분(쪽지,SMS) ,A.RECV_ID --받는사람ID ,A.RECV_NM --받는사람 이름 ,A.SEQ_NO --일련번호 ,A.MN_ID --메뉴ID ,A.TITLE --제목 ,A.CNTNT --내용 ,A.HP_NO --휴대폰번호 ,(SELECT CD_NM FROM TBEA_SPEC_CD WHERE 1=1 AND GRP_CD = 'E00136' AND CD = A.ALARM_GBN) AS ALARM_NM ,TO_CHAR(A.INST_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS INST_DT ,TO_CHAR(A.INST_DT, 'hh24:mi') AS INST_DTM ,(SELECT MN_NM FROM TBEA_MN WHERE MN_ID = A.MN_ID) MN_NM ,(SELECT USER_NM FROM VWEA_USER WHERE USER_ID = A.INST_ID) INST_ID ,NVL(S.RESULT,M.RESULT) AS SMSRSLT ,NVL2(SMS_SEQ_NO,NVL2(S.RESULT,'SMS','MMS'),'') AS SMS_TYPE FROM TBEA_ALARM_HIST A --알림전송이력 ,VWEA_USER C ,SMS.SMSDATA S ,SMS.MMSDATA M WHERE 1=1 AND A.INST_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.SMS_SEQ_NO = S.SEQNO(+) AND A.SMS_SEQ_NO = M.SEQNO(+) AND TO_CHAR(A.INST_DT, 'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN ? AND ? AND A.ALARM_GBN LIKE ?||'%' AND A.RECV_NM LIKE ? || '%' -- 받는사람 AND C.USER_NM LIKE ? || '%' -- 보낸사람 ORDER BY A.ALARM_GBN,A.INST_DT DESC

INSERT INTO TBEA_ALARM_HIST ( /* e01010180_i01 */ ALARM_GBN --알람구분 ,RECV_ID --받는사람ID ,RECV_NM ,SEQ_NO --일련번호 ,MN_ID --메뉴ID ,HP_NO --이동전화번호 ,TITLE --제목 ,CNTNT --내용 ,SMS_SEQ_NO ,INST_ID --작성자ID ,INST_DT --작성일시 ) VALUES ( ? -- ALARM_GBN , ? -- RECV_ID , ? -- RECV_NM , SQ_TBRK_ALARM_HIST.NEXTVAL -- SEQ_NO , ? -- MN_ID , ? -- HP_NO , ? -- TITLE , ? -- CNTNT , ? -- SMS_SEQ_NO , ? -- INST_ID , SYSDATE -- INST_DT )
UPDATE TBEA_ALARM_HIST ( /* e01010180_u01 */ SMS_SEQ_NO --SMS 전송 번호 WHERE ALARM_GBN = ? AND RECV_ID = ? AND SEQ_NO = ?

INSERT /* e01010180_i02 */ INTO SMS.SMSDATA( SEQNO, -- INDATE, INTIME, MEMBER, SENDID,
RPHONE1, RPHONE2, RPHONE3, RECVNAME,
SPHONE1, SPHONE2, SPHONE3, SENDNAME,
MSG, URL,
RDATE, RTIME, RESULT, KIND, ERRCODE, SYS_GBN, USERID )VALUES( ?, --SEQNO TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'yyyymmdd'), TO_CHAR (SYSDATE, 'hh24miss'), 0, 'kcycle',
?, --RPHONE1 ?, --RPHONE2 ?, --RPHONE3 ?, --RECVNAME
?, --SPHONE1 ?, --SPHONE2 ?, --SPHONE3 ?, --SENDNAME
SUBSTRB(?, 1, 120), --MSG '', ?, --RDATE(예약발송일자) ?, --RTIME(예약발송시간) '0', 'S', 0, 'USRBM', ? -- SENDUSERID
)

INSERT /* e01010180_i03 */ INTO SMS.MMSDATA( SEQNO, -- 연번 USERCODE, -- 고객사코드 INTIME, -- 요청일시 REQTIME, -- 예약발송시간 RECVTIME, -- 단말기 수신시간 CALLPHONE, -- 수신자 전화번호 REQPHONE, -- 발송자 전화번호 SUBJECT, -- 제목 MSG, -- 문자메세지 내용 FKCONTENT, -- 미디어 외부참조키 MEDIATYPE, -- 단말기 통신사 코드 RESULT, -- 결과 ERRCODE -- 오류코드 ) VALUES ( ?, 'kcycle', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), ?, NULL, REPLACE(?,'-',''), ?, SUBSTRB(?,1,80), ?, 0, NULL, '0', 0)
SELECT /* e01010180_s02 */ SMS.SQ_SMSDATA.NEXTVAL SMS_SEQ_NO -- SMS DATA KEY FROM DUAL
SELECT /* e01010180_s03 */ SMS.SEQNO.NEXTVAL SMS_SEQ_NO -- SMS DATA KEY FROM DUAL
